name: Just Geometry & Music
description:
This is a Recreating of Just Shapes & Beats! Just Shapes & Beats is a very fun rhythm game, highly recommend you go buy it!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/531510/Just_Shapes__Beats/

Since I couldn't afford it I made my own Just Shapes and Beats!

A Devlog Type of video on my YouTube Channel!

Controls

W - Up

S - Down

A - Left

D - Right

Space - Dash

Same as JSAB
